original_text: “You should stay here in the land of Judah. If you do that, I will build you up and make you strong again. I will not knock you down. I will help you to grow in the land, like plants with good roots. I will not pull you up. I have punished you with terrible trouble, and that makes me very sad. So now I will help you.
korean_text: 너희가 이 땅에 눌러 앉아 산다면 내가 너희를 세우고 헐지 아니하며 너희를 심고 뽑지 아니하리니 이는 내가 너희에게 내린 재난에 대하여 뜻을 돌이킴이라

sentences.original_text: You should stay here in the land of Judah.
I will build you up and make you strong again.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 세우고 다시 강하게 만들 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will not knock you down.
I will help you to grow in the land,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네가 땅에서 자라도록 도울 것이다,

sentences.original_text: I will not pull you up.
I have punished you with terrible trouble,
and that makes me very sad.
So now I will help you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이제 내가 너를 도울 것이다.
